description: "This mid-19th century map of Southeast Asia is illustrated with drawings of indigenous people from New Guinea, a ‘bee bear’ (probably a sun bear), a sailboat in front of Victoria Mount in New Guinea, and a village and palm trees in Sarawak, Borneo."
title: "Malay Archipelago, or, East India Islands / the map was drawn & engraved by J. Rapkin ; the illustrations by H. Warren and engraved by T. Smith."
